GOAL FOUND!

Solution

(1,1) -> (2,2)
(2,2) -> (2,2)
(2,2) -> (1,2)
(1,2) -> (1,2)
(1,2) -> (0,2)
(0,2) -> (1,1)
(1,1) -> (0,1)
(0,1) -> (1,1)
(1,1) -> (0,0)
